properties.name: scopeCode
properties.label: Field Scope Code
properties.description: The field scope to use for validation and autocomplete (filters jreFieldDefinition records)

properties.name: height
properties.label: Editor Height
properties.description: Height of the editor. Use 'auto' for auto-sizing, or specify a value like '300px' or '50vh'

properties.name: showDictionary
properties.label: Show Field Dictionary
properties.description: Show the field dictionary panel for autocomplete

properties.name: showSaveButton
properties.label: Show Save Button
properties.description: Show a separate save button in the editor toolbar

properties.name: rulesetCodeField
properties.label: Ruleset Code Field ID
properties.description: Form field ID to read/write ruleset code. Leave empty to auto-generate new code on save.

properties.name: rulesetNameField
properties.label: Ruleset Name Field ID
properties.description: Form field ID to read ruleset name/description

properties.name: filterCategories
properties.label: Filter by Categories
properties.description: Select which field categories to show in the dictionary (leave empty for all)

properties.name: filterFieldTypes
properties.label: Filter by Field Types
properties.description: Select which field types to show in the dictionary (leave empty for all)

properties.name: filterIsGrid
properties.label: Filter by Grid Fields
properties.description: Filter fields by whether they are grid fields

properties.name: filterLookupFormId
properties.label: Filter by Lookup Form ID
properties.description: Only show fields with this lookup form ID (leave empty for all)

properties.name: apiEndpoint
properties.label: API Base URL
properties.description: Base URL for the Rules API (e.g., /jw/api/jre/jre)

properties.name: apiId
properties.label: API ID
properties.description: API ID for Rules service authentication (from API Builder)

properties.name: apiKey
properties.label: API Key
properties.description: API Key for Rules service authentication
